values: Okay, so things with my anger are kind of calming down, but the drama isn't... how could it?  I spoke to my mother for more then five minutes for the first time in at least four weeks today, because she's been sleeping 24/7 and not eating a thing for days in a row... which makes it hard for her to stand up when she's accually awake, it's hard for me to watch her be so helpless, and in a way, the roles have sort of switched, I make sure Mum eats, and that Ed doesn't go on a rampage about every little thing(which by the way I've not been successful at).  Well the other day, my mom just starts crying and saying how sorry she was being a bad mother, I told her it wasn't her fault at all, but she insisted on making me go to my Grandmother's place... not fun, she spent at least an hour attacking everything about me, how I'm gaining weight, how I'm not 'normal'(whatever the hell that means), how my friends are horrible druggys, how I'm a loser for not being a good role model to my stupid little cousins... and the list goes on, and it made me feel like a fat, worthless, drug addicted freak... and I was crying for a long time, with no one to call >.< how sad... so I'm going home tonight THANK GOD!  Okay, I'm done with my ranting... for now,till next week my friends!

weee... emotion roller coasters are fun!!  Now really, I've been stressed out alot lately, with my mum's situation, then toss in the ever famous fucking friend drama, and guys and... blah.  I've been thinkong alot lately about what the hell I'm doing here, living, right now it doesn't seem for much more then to cry a whole fucking lot and get complained at alot :\ not exactly fun.  It's frustrating having the person you could accually talk to being mad at you, but I've still got my Stephanie, and other people *cough* yup.  See, look at me being all optimistic like!  Oh!  today I almost punched this fucking poser ass fucker at my school... he's always being a dick and making fun of emo... ass hole, but I stopped myself, aren't you proud?  Ed told me if it wasn't for my mom being so sick right now, he'd kick my ass out... how loving huh?  Whatever, fuck him.  I've been using that word alot lately... fuck.  Sorry, I've got problems :)  Anyway, my computer is still broken and Im using Blondies again, so bye bye till next time I get a computer

hmm... last entry I don't quite remember posting, just to let you all know.  Anyway, things are... weird.  My mum, as I'm sure I've told most of you is in the hospital again, she had to get another surgery, and has to stay there 'til thursday :(  It's difficult living with just Ed and his scary, super clean freak drunken self.  I'm at lovely Blondie's house!  She want me to take a shower *giggle*  or maybe I smell icky?  I don't know.  So, I've been chilling with Andrea lots lately... I don't know why Steph is avoiding me... eh Steph?  Why be you avoiding me?  I gots a crush finally... it'll never work out though, but it's nice having something to giggle about.  Right?  Right?!  Sure.  I've been having lots of dreams about my friends deserting me, I hope it doesn't come true.  I had one where I was hugging them, and POOF they magicly turned to dust... then another one with a long ass PT cruiser, and they were all in it, they started to drive off and I grabbed onto the mirror, then it started to stretch as they drove off, and just left me there... stretch mirrors are trippy... how in the world did my mind think of a stretchy mirror?  Had I just watched a Polly Pocket commercial maybe?  Who knows.  Alright, Im finished... now Im off to mope maybe.
my computers a fag!  Im on steph and andreas house... yup... my mum is sick again >.< damn...  whatever, later guys hahahahaha!
fucking falling for people I can't have... shit!  "and I'm useless, Im useless against this" Hella Dashboard!

oh God... my computer is still being a dick, and Im on the Paccioni's computer right now... I'm staying here fort he weekends... my parents are in Hawaii for two weeks... which means 10 days at my grandma's house, horrible... horrible, she's near disowned me for liking both sexes and wearing tight clothes >.<  yup... anyone want to steal me?  Please?  Eh, I thought not.  I'm leaving now.. love you guys!  -smooch-  oh yeah... this being happy thing feels really nice!  -nods-

haha, my computer wont let me on-line, so Im updated at the church!  hehe!  Anyway, hella going to make fun of the zebra movie ^.^  wow, Im accually in a good mood... the worlds going to end!  My parents are going to hawaii for 2 weeks w/o me!  but I get to stay weekends at steph's house... and that kicks ass!!  Okay, Im going to get bye bye now... this keyboard is a fuck!  Later!!!

<font size=4>go hang a salami, im a lasagna hog</font>

now, read that backwards and it says the same thing!  how great is that?!?!  kick ass, I know... hella!

God I waste alot of my time being sad, it almost(get this!) MAKES ME SAD!  I get upset over the stupidest things too... like, my parents being ass holes... WHO CARES?!?!  Isn't that what they're supposed to do?  And why the fuck do I get so mad when people go off with other people, its not like the world HAS to be about me 24/7... jesus I'm selfish!  Eh, whatever... I'm going insane!!!!!!!  Lack of sleep and food, and being sick gets to you after awhile.  So, last night was WEIRD, my parents got in an argument because I said I didn't care for the food!  Ed got all pissy and called me something along the lines of 'an ungrateful, selfish, immature child' er, all this because of the fact that I don't like spit pea soup?!?  Whatever, I jsut kind of let it go, but when I started to tlak again he told me to be quiet and drop it... when I was only going to talk about something that happened at school.  Eh... I don't like being sick... it makes my all hot and cold, and hungry(but I can't stand to eat), and CRAZY.  I think I'll go pass out, oooh, how fun!

meh... the VD show was okay... but some people where being asses -cough- my mum, ed, blondie, and me stayed at the nugget for free last night... it was okay... I saw someone I met from the show there... and there was some sort of shindig thing going on... and there were lots of pretty boys... and I mean... LOTS.  Of coarse, Blondie got hit on, not me though, I just kinda stood there... Im fucking pathetic.  Oh well, so Im feeling sad again, and lonely... heh, go figure... bye bye

I feel lazy and useless... I didn't go to school today, and called one of my man-buddies to check up on him and he started flipping out about how I never do anything right, and I need to take a good look at the stuff I'm doing, that I'm a cocaine addict, and I need to focas on school more than relationships... I ended up crying and hanging up on him... stupid bastard, who says shit like that to someone you haven't talked to in like... so much for him accepting me for who I was, and being 'in love' with me... what a douche!  Eh, sorry, none of you know him, so no worrys... but seriously, I'm starting to wonder if what he said was true, like... I do fuck up alot, I am doing alot of fucked up stuff, and I do tend to wonder away from school... I'm not a cocaine addict though, never even tried it!  I swear!  Anyway, I bassicly feel like shit, and I think I'm getting sick again... anyone... HELP????  Why do I bother?  Oh, I realized I need to not eat when I'm bored... (which is almost ALWAYS) cause Im geting fat fat fat fat fat....Woah, I have some serious fucking self esteem issues, haha, and I'm saying this while munching on cheetos, how pathetic!

I'm in such a bad mood, stupid drama with stupid people... Im not saying who though, 'cause I don't want to upset anyone... so, I felt the need to update... even though no one but stephanie, andrea, and(maybe) my buddie Evan care.  You know what... I think those three (besides blondie) are the only people that are really my friends... how pathetic.  You know what's funny?  When Blondie's not at school, the only person I can hangout with is... drumroll..... MYSELF!  damn, I suck.  Whatever, I hope all this drama(and not just my own) goes away... it's starting to make me fat!  DId I mention I'm failing 4 of my classes?  Yup... go me! -dies-

Sunday band. You think the other gender sucks
major ass, they just know how to fuck you up.
Maybe you're right, but still, try to be a
little bit more positive. Go have sex, it'll
cheer you up.

okay, what is up?  This weekend has been pretty amusing.  Steph, Andrea and Me bought 99 red balloons and set them off in Steph's backyardish thingy.  Then we spent three hours at walmart, riding carts and shopping... hahaha.  Erm, I've been very lonely at school, stupid punk rockers... anyway, Im off to do stupid things...
my throat hurts... I think Im getting sick... and that sucks, maybe if I get sick enough Ill loose weight, Im staring to get chubby... meh

I've been listening to Postal Service alot... probably because it calms me down and I've been getting upset easily lately, that or I'm just to lazy to change the damned CD  God I hate the snow, sute at first it's pretty, but after awhile it jsut gets annoying, because I can't do anything or go any where.  Eh, Just my little note of bitching, bye people...

Is it weird that I can't remember anything from today except for the times when I was pissed off, sad, or scared?  Is it weird that it's been that way for about a month or so?  Maybe it's because those are pretty much all my emotions?  I cried at youth group tonight... no one knew, I was right in the big group too... oh well, I'm just going to stop my bitching.  I did feel nice to cry though... oh yeah, this is random, but doesn't that mood kitty look like he's having trouble pooing?  Nevermind, just one of my random musings.

So... new years sucked ass, nothing against Steph's house, it just would have been like 80 million times better if I had gone to my friend Aiyona's party... or at least went to the lock in.  The snow ruined my plans... what a fucker.  *sigh*  so now I'm hanging out with Blondie and my mother's having a fucking break down because her hair is almost all gone from the Kemotherepy(did I spell that right?)  So yeah, Ed's getting frustrated with it so they're arguing and BLAH!  It's fucking freezing in my house!  *sigh*  anyone want to make a small attempt to cheer me up?  Highly doubtful, but whatever.  224 4929

And I'm not doing shit... typical me... sitting at home BEFORE my parents... I need to meet some new people.  *nods*  that or get intact with the ones I already know and FORSE THEM to hang with me... yup, thats how fucking pathetic I am.  *sigh*  at least I get to open presents tomarrow... its sad when even that doesn't make me happy.  Damn getting lonely... and I thought blasting music and pissing off the neighbors would make me feel better, guess not... I know what I need, but all of you would jump me for saying it, or even thinking it cause you know... stupid Shelby has to be clean 24 fucking 7... Ima cry now, have a Merry Christmas. *sigh*

I have the lowest self esteem right now that I think I've ever had in my short life time... maybe I'm just like being a bitch to myself, but I've noticed I'm kind of a side note to alot of people, I'm barely ever 'Shelby', it's usually 'sonso's friend', or 'that chick with the brown hair and is tall' or 'that poser bitch'.  Yup that's me... little miss nothing.  I gotta stop having weird dreams like the one I had last night where I was trying to help out my friend Evan and he was like 'you slut, stop throwing yourself at guys so much... and stop trying to help people, you just fuck things up'  and than I went over to blondie & steph to try and be comforted and they just kind of laughed at me, then like... Cesar, Ryan, Davey, Chris, Darin, and my parents like start to kick me and laugh until they where rolling on the ground, yup.  No wonder I woke up feeling like shit... whatever, no one is reading this anyways
My mother is sick again... fuck, she has to stay in the hospital for a week or so... what the hell did I do to deserve this much crap at one time?

I didn't go to school loday on account of my Mommy not being able to because she is sick again and has some weird pain thingy in her ribs.  I'm trying to to stress to much about it.  So, once again I'm stuck between my friends... I can't just totally ditch one because some others aren't happy with her, but it is pretty fucked what's happening, I'm trying to be mature and calm about it... but honestly I don't think anything I say to either side sinks in because the whole feud is just dumb.  They're mean to her, so she gives up on them which makes them feel like she's ditching them for fucking Scott, which I can see, but what hte hell do they care?  It's not like it's going to be their heart in a million peices is it?  I dont give a rats ass if they arent going to back Scott up, because neither am I, but totally ditching her and talking crap behind her back isnt nescary, and they are trying to tell me that they wouldn't think about and do more with a guy they really liked then their friends... thats bull shit, because I know that I would do just what she is... minus quitting the drama team because of some petty shit that gets said... whatever, I might as well just give up huh?  God damnit this sucks... I feel like a fucking rubber band being stretched so far that it's going to break... maybe I will.  Hell, I might as well just end up screaming in all of their faces and ending up in my lovely little corner that I'm always  put in after trying to fix things that I didn't even fuck up.  Did I mention that my friends on the drama team are going to ditch me if Megan lets Alexis back on the team?  How FUCKING FUCKED UP is that huh?  What bullshit.  Oh, and for all of you mommys that like to snoop, DONT if you know that theres going to be stuff you dont like... I'm sure we ALL know who I'm talking about...
um... bored bored bored... not particuarly... I just wanted to updated
Just shoot me now... thats all I need to say

'allo my sweet little 'friends'  how are ya?  Um, Im bored as hell and decided to post.  Today was okay, blondie, me and my friends sam but they bailed out and it was just me and blondie.  So, we ended up not going to the movie andj sut roaming around parklane for three hours.  Not the greatest thing ever, but it's better than being around Ed and his bitching at me.  So I got some undies and a wrist band... and osmething else I think but I can't remember.  Meh, my mom was bitching at me again today 'cause she thought she smelt ciggarette smoke, she was fucking spazzing out and calling me a fucking liar when I told her it was insense.  So she was fucking like 'Damnit Shelby, why can't I fucking trust you anymore?"  I didn't say anything, because at the moment I knew some naughty words would come out so I jsut shook my head and walked off.  But seriously, it's her own damn fault, because I earned it back, but she's got it in her head that Im the worst God damned kid in the world.  Shit man, I have to much stress, wouldn't it be rad if I could just wring it out like a wet towel?  But no, Im stuck in my nice little hole, avoiding shit like drugs, and drinking, and fucking cutting.  Sometimes it feels like I have a lack of support, just cause when I do fuck up, there isn't anyone I can tell that gives a shit, wont tell anyone, or wont judge me and get pissed off at me.  Now doesn't that suck?  Indeed.  So whatever, I'm done bitching at you guys, later.

Today started out ok... but then magicly POOF!  Bad mood, I just feel like shrivling up into a ball and disapearing into nothingness, or doing some OTHER stuff, in which I've given up.  Unlike other people, one of which got caught smoking weed in the bathroom at school today.  She came to  class and was totally freaking out because they where looking for her.  Anyway, I wanna throw up... my tummy has been being a bitch at me all day and it's bugging the shit out of me.  Perhaps it's the cold?  Afterall, the cold is my worst enemy... it's all.. cold, and not warm and stuff, its no fun.  meh, I don't even have anything to talk about... maybe I need medication?  Whatever...  I never get any comments either, doesnt that suck?

woah, I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm happy!  It's such a great feeling, I just might explode!  Thing is, nothing really all that great has happend to me lately... if anything, things suck alot... but I don't really give a shit, I'm tired of feeling like nothing every day, so I'm just giving up on it... fuck petty shit, people(not mentioning any names) can handle their own damned problems, 'cause I don't give a shit any more... well, I do... but I'm not gunna do anything about it unless asked... so I'm just gunna let Stacie bitch, and other people bitch... and cry and moan blah,blah,blah... I'm staying happy.  Selfish?  For sure, but whatever... I'll get over it eventually.  Besides, I was getting upset over so many people and their problems that I didn't realize mine, so I couldn't fix them, thus making me unhappy.

Anyway, I'm done with this... I shall talk to you all sometime later... boy boy!  xoxo

um... yeah I'm @ lovely blondie's house right now... shes really ttired... heh.  Anyways, I'm feeling rather non sad lately... yay for me?  I'm very content right now I guess you could say!  Yay!  So... I still want some one special in my life, but it obviously isnt gunna happen anytime soon, so I'l just give up until I... never mind.  So.... um, yeah... hella bored, later yo!

I didnt go to school today 5 day week end, YAY!  I love you all... 4 more days my lovies... I'll see you then  *smooches*

Hey people...sorry I haven't updated in awhile..well here are some things I have writen down between now and well ya my last post...

11/17/04
I am feeling a tingel of happiness, I love my friends, they're the most awsomest people EVER.  Some people how ever aren't so great like Marshall, I just wanna smack him for hurting Steph! *breaths* Okay, so...Im seriousaly trying to kiss up to my mom so she'll let me go to the Taking Back Sunday concert, oh my god that would rock almost as much as the AFI (maby it'd be just the same in coolness!) Any ways shit to attend to to..so bye bye!


Eh, I'm doing okay, mildley sick though. WHat's new with it right? I had a mild break down in my mathclass..but I mostly kept it to myself. God people are dumn sometimes! This chick that I hang with/talk to in my 2end period thought it'd be rad to help me out by keeping my stuff and giving it to Callie to give to me in my last period class. I left the class by saying I needed a pass to the nurse but I actually went to 2nd lunch to chill with, Blondie,Miriam,Stacie and the whole crowd, because they all had complete 7th grade...NvM, I'm not gunna explain. Anyways, I ditched 2nd period 4 second lunch and Brandi decides to keep my stuff because she didn't think I would come back for it...yeah so I was spazzing and spend 1/2 of english in the office seeing if it was there. I'm still kinda sad but I'm hoping that enough of Greenday will save me! :)so...Yeah.Later

Fuck... I feel like shit, physicly and mentally.  My throat is killing me and it hurts back enough to cry when I swallow anything solid, and my nose is stuffy... like I can't breathe through it.  I can't sleep at all, and I've been up since 3:00 AM giving me like, 2 hours of sleep.  My mom has been bitching at me for reasons I wont mention and Stephanies good-for-nothing sister is a fucking backstabber... that's all I'll say.  Got I need a shoulder to cry on right now, but again I am alone... grounded from everything.  Matter of fact, I'm not even supposed to be on the computer.  Really... I'm so far into this hole, it's like God gave up on me... like my mother gave up on me... like everyone had given up on me.  I need someone to help me, but no one wants to... or looks like they want to, maybe I should just give up on life, it's that fucking easy.  I've tried waiting for the pain to go away, its evident that it wont... I'm that pathetic.  I know my life isn't as bad as alot of people's, but that's not my problem... I just want all of this to go away, all of the people nagging me, all of the people setting expectations for me that I can't live up to, the lies I'm telling to others, and to myself, the pressure.  It ownt happen though, it's life... I guess what thats what I want to end then ey?  Whatever.... shit sucks right now, that's my point...

I feel rather grungy right now... cause I got home and was like... hella sleepy, so I passed out on the couch directly after I sat on it, in my clothes and everything... erm, so now it's about time to shower, but I figured I'd grace you all with an update ^.^ SO last night was pretty fun compared to what I usually do. Ya know, my life it pretty damned pathetic... whatever I just feel like bitching right now, because I'm lame like that. So, someone is really starting to piss me off right now, dont worry, it'd none of you, because you all rock and arent egotistical, disrespectful.... fuckers! haha! Sorry, inside joke. So, um, today I get to go make cookies, rad huh??? Then I can turn into the fat ass that I was ment to be! Eh, I feel bad now... Im not gunna say why... but I'm a horrible person. *nods* what kind of a worthless peice of shit does what I did to a good friend? I need some fucking stregth right now... but it isn't comeing... let's pray my mask doesn't fail me... God forbid I let someone see my pain ey? Whatever, I'm boring all of you socks off and I need a shower... later.

So I'm with Steph.... acting kind of funny, but what's new ey?  Erm... yeah... Visible Darkness concert... pretty rad I guess, Marshal's a fucker/idiot and didn't have the sense to call me and ask for a ride to come chill with Steph and me(and bring a friend *wink*)  anyways... later!

what is it with me lately?  Jesus, I'm fuking stupid... sad/pissed off because of a guy I have no chance with... and I was foolish enough to think something could happen.  Remind me to NEVER EVER do this again, I'm such an idiot... I've admited to it... yet, I'm still sad about, how much bull shit is that?!  Whatever, I hope this will be over soon...

so Alexis is hurting... everyone is hurting, I suppose my emotions can wait so I can help them... that's what I was built for right? My God damned ankle hurt from slipping... how stupid is that.. w/e... here's a thingy... yes, pretty good results... not sure how well I would do at a dance with a person that likes NINJAS when PIRATES are clearly BETTER

alrighty, so today was pretty good, I'm feeling mighty fine... !!!like I just pet a zebra!!!  um, sorry... please don't ask.  Despite the poor music joises at youth group(mainly because of the experiances I've have with most of the songs), I would say nothing bad happend.  So, my grades suck, but oh well... I might go to kentucky for 3 weeks of next summer, I get to see Mark and Addie and Manda!  Hella... not so sure about seeing mark though >.<  whatever, I'm over him.  So... alot of my friends are depressed.... thats sucks, because it seems they don't want my help... whatever, Im not gunna bug myself with it and ruin my good day.... toodles!

Oct 24, 04

  So today sucked, well not rally... it just sucks right now because my mom and Ed are being stupid.  Ed thought I was giving attitude because of some shit that I said and started cussing at me and lecturing about respect, fuck him... he has to earn it... fucker.  He's and idiot... he fucking threw his broom to show his anger... stupid ass.  He was probably drunk off his ass.  He's always drinking, so I cant tell the difference.  So I got grounded by me mother for calling him and asshole(WHICH HE IS!!!)and now I can't go any where, whatever, Im really fucking pissed off right now and I want to cut like no other... fuck this.


Today:
   So today was okay, I saw Davey again, I swear it isn't healthy for my health...haha, healthy for my health...  I want him so bad... but it's never gunna happen, seeing as we never see eachother... I want my summer back... I want Davey to be mine... shit man, oh well... I guess its best not to think about him... so anyways, take my quiz bitches... OR ELSE!

<A HREF="http://www.quizyourfriends.com/yourquiz_IM.php?quizname=041025180932-375359">Yeah, click here.... thats right, clickity click</font>

okay, so since I havn't updated, I wrote stuff on paper to get my damned emotions out...

Oct 19 04

  I don't want this feeling, or lack of feeling rather.  I want things to be normal again but then, where things ever normal?  Or was I just oblivious to the shit around me?  That's it, because there's no way I could have been as happy as I remember, I must have been stupid or something, becuase happiness doesn't exist for me any longer, and I don't believe it will ever.. I'm to damned pessimistic.

Oct 21 04

  I'm crying again, God I hate this feeling of hidden depression, hidden loneliness & regret. Some say you shouldn't regret your life, but I do, I hate how I turned out, this so called 'image' this so called 'originality' is bringing more pain to me then I can take.  I am not different anymore, there are so many people that try to be clones of me.  I just judge automaticly & say that they aren't being real and I miss myself offsometimes, I have really low self esteem right now.  It's like I'm not good enough for the world, I'm bottling up my emotions because it's impossible for me to talk to someone and take something from is.  My mom is always bitching because she thinks I don't caring about her... I do, but what the hell does she want from me?  I try my best to respect her and not be an ass, but ya know, I slip sometimes.  So school has become an annoyance, I don't want to be tehre I swear it's a mirical I haven't blown up on a large scale then the bus thing. Okay, I'm feeling real down right now... sort of like I've been pushed to the side... like I'm unwanted and well, sort of hated.  I'm getting really clingy and dependent on people, and frankly... I need a break from all of this, but not just a little bit of sleep, I'm talking like... all day and night sleep... but I can't sleep that long.  I'm lucky if I manage 5 hours of sleep, I'm having alot of nightmares... of people dieing, myself dieing, watching people I love dearly being ripped to peices, and my own heart being torn apart by everyone I love and care for.  Oh my God... I want things to be normal again... nice and calm and normal... that would be nice, oh yes, really really nice. but it's not going to be... not now, not ever...


 Now, I shall put a note  Alexis gave to me at school today...

Alexis,
  What the hell?!  I have a right to be pissed at you.  Damnit, I don't do drugs!  I smoked like... three times!  And I don't drink... personally I hate the taste of alcohol! I'm not perfect... and if you don't want to be a friend with a cutter/ getting arrested chick, then I guess I really over rated the ammount of loyalty I had in you... damn...

Love,

lets see here, interesting day indeed. Last night was amusing, I got to talk to a couple of people that I've never spoken with before. Molly is officially the most amusing hyper person I've ever seen, and Scott is an ass hole... again. Any hoot, Blondie sayed the night and we decided to walk to Raley's this morning, on our way there we stopped at Stacie's to see if she wanted to come, she wasn't allowed, so we just walked about her trailer park for awhile before she had to go back home. Then we went to see if Davey and all them wanted to come, they were sleeping, lazy ass bums. Anyway, I watched Passion of the Christ for the first time, powerful movie. Sort of got me thinking about stuff in the world. I ended up crying for about an hour because I was thinking about stuff with me mum and I guess cause of guilt due to that one night at Stacie's, and partly cause of the world I suppose. So I was thinking about shit that happends at my school and things people do and say, and that's just jr. high, only. So one of my friend's brother has died in the war about a week ago. She's pretty torn up. It sickens me to know how many other people are experiancing that same feeling. Now she's going to drugs, and cutting and shit, reminds me veugly of myself. She has alot going on that I'd rather not put here, so I guess maybe I'll try to show her God, she needs him right now. Her situation sort of makes me grateful of what I have, no matter how much I feel I need 'someone', at least I'm not where she is. Yeah, so I threw up just alittle bit ago cause my nerves are on edge, not good, now I have the worst head ache I think I've ever had. Meh, good day turned a little to thought wrenching. Ah, yet another party has arosen, damn I swear, those boys gotta learn that weed and crack don't exactly make my friend or me want to jump over their house and become buddy buddy with them... it happend once to us, I'll do whatever it takes to have it never happen again. I think my rebellion stage is almost over, and I did it all without getting a boyfriend and cheating on them. Surprised? So am I. Not really, but what the hell, I'm bored and overly emotional, but mixture my friends, bad mixture. I think I'll just go shower, yes, showering sounds just lovely right now doesn't it? Yes indeed it does kind sirlady.
